group_1.textRight: ...After we pull out all the mushrooms growing@here...
It'd be a waste to throw them away,@can I take some home with me?

group_1.textLeft: Why not? I think I'll take some with me, too.

group_1.textRight: Yaaay!

group_1.textLeft: I think it's around here...
Here it is! A plastic bag.
Here you go, Tsumugi.

group_1.textRight: Thank you!

group_1.textLeft: Now then, I'll start at the front of the classroom@and leave the back to you, okay?

group_1.textRight: Yeah! I'm on it!

group_1.textLeft: But is this supposed to be trouble...?
Trouble is trouble, but I wonder what the@blackmailer is thinking...

group_1.textRight: [chara:302401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! Kanoko-senpai, you know about the@threatening letter?!

group_1.textLeft: Doesn't everyone in school know about it?

group_1.textRight: "Don't talk about this, it'll only confuse the@students!"
That's what we were told at the committee@meeting...I wonder who leaked it...?

group_1.textLeft: There's a saying that the walls have ears...
Isn't it impossible to keep a secret?

group_1.textRight: ...Ugh, everyone likes to spread rumors...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
The girls in my class were sharing a rumor that the culprit was invisible...

group_1.textRight: What?! The culprit is an invisible person?!

group_1.textLeft: No...aren't they just messing around?
When the threatening letter was placed on the@principal's desk...
No one was caught on the security cameras,@that's all.

group_1.textRight: Really...I didn't know that...

group_1.textLeft: Well, maybe it was just someone really familiar@with the school.
They would have been able to exploit the@security camera's blind spots.

group_1.textRight: Oh, I see! That's great, Senpai! You're like@a detective!

group_1.textLeft: ...It was a girl in my class who said that,@not me...
Is this the last one?

group_1.textRight: Hey! What are you packing in that bag?!

group_1.textLeft: It's just mushrooms...
Oh, welcome back Manaka! Will you take some@home with you, too?

group_1.textRight: I won't, and please don't.

group_1.textLeft: Why not?

group_1.textRight: Because it's toxic, and you'll get sick to your@stomach if you eat it.

group_1.textLeft: These aren't poisonous mushrooms, remember?

group_1.textRight: Processed wood products like desks contain@preservatives.
The mushrooms that grow there will also@soak up preservatives.
As a result, even non-toxic mushrooms can@become toxic.

group_1.textLeft: But...it's such a waste to throw them away...

group_1.textRight: Do you want to wreck your stomach?@Then I won't stop you.

group_1.textLeft: I get it...I give up...
Sorry for leaving this to you, Kanoko.

group_1.textRight: We're done moving! The mushrooms are@all safe!

group_1.textLeft: Thank goodness! I just finished up here, too.

group_1.textRight: I'm just glad that the mushrooms I grew are@safe... I was afraid they'd be ruined...

group_1.textLeft: You were so unwilling at first.

group_1.textRight: That's true, but...I've gotten attached to them.
I guess you have to give everything a try.

group_1.textLeft: I see...it's not just about stopping people.
Maybe the plan was to demotivate them by@ruining the mushrooms!

group_1.textRight: Well...it's more likely than baiting us with@mushrooms, anyway...

group_1.textLeft: Can you carry out the cookware and such?
I'll seal off this classroom just in case, and@have the contractor take care of it.

group_1.textRight: Yes ma'am!
And thank you, committee members! I think@we can handle the rest.

group_1.textLeft: No problem! I'm on the committee, after all!
Thank you for your help, and if you have@any problems, please let me know.

group_1.textRight: Yes! Well, we'll leave you to it!
Hmm? ...Seeds? Senpai, did you drop these?

group_1.textLeft: Seeds...? They're not mine...

group_1.textRight: Tsumugi, your phone keeps buzzing...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wow! There's a lot of calls for help here!
(I'll just put the seeds into my pocket for now.)
Hurry, hurry! See you later, Kanoko-senpai!
